bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN EFFICIENT DYNAMIC MULTI-UNIT AUCTION

abstract.p: The present invention implements an auction in which multiple types of goods may be auctioned in a dynamic process. In a preferred embodiment, the present invention is a system and method for computer implemented dynamic multi-unit auction in which the price paid or received by bidders tends to be independent of their own bids, in which participants may be provided with information concerning their competitors' bids as the auction progresses, and in which the confidentiality of high values may be maintained. Participants' quantities bid at a given time may be restricted to be less than or equal to the quantities bid at an earlier time. These features provide the advantage of improving economic efficiency of the auction design over the prior art.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for an auction of multiple types of items
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN AUCTION OF MULTIPLE TYPES OF ITEMS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE D'ENCHERES POUR DES ARTICLES DE TYPES MULTIPLES

abstract.p: A system and method for a computer-implemented auction in which multiple typ es of items are auctioned together without imposing a particular division of supply or demand among the individual types of items. In some embodiments th e auction (30) provides a means or method for establishing prices for the type s of items, therein the prices maintain a relationship. In other embodiments, the present invention provides a means or method for implying prices from price parameters in the bids received from bidders (20a, 20b, 20c), based on a relation among the prices for the types of items. Market clearing may be defined by the condition that the aggregate quantity bid for all types of items is less than or equal to the available quantity of all types of items. The division among the types of items within is thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices. In other embodiments, market clearing is defined by the condition that the quantity bid for one selected type of item is less than or equal to the available quantity of the selected type of item. The quantities of the other types of items are thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM UND VERFAHREN FÜR EINE AUKTION MEHRERER ARTEN VON POSTEN
System and method for an efficient dynamic multi-unit auction
System und Verfahren für eine effiziente und dynamische Auktion für mehrere identische Güter
Système et méthode pour une vente aux enchères efficace et dynamique pour plusieurs biens identiques

nplcit.text: No Search

abstract.p: 1. A method for using a computer to implement an auction of heterogeneous objects two or more bidders participating in the auction, the auction allowing assignment of objects of the same type to one or more of the bidders at different prices, the method comprising: a) inputting, into the computer, bids from participating bidders

b) determining at the computer, based on the bids, whether there is at least one object which is desired by only one bidder and, c) in the event there is at least one object which is desired by only one bidder, assigning the determined object or objects to the determined bidder, wherein said determining comprises determining if a nonempty set of objects is minimal in the winning set of a bidder. <IMAGE>

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for an efficient dynamic multi-unit auction
System und Verfahren für eine effiziente und dynamische Auktion für mehrere identische Güter
Système et méthode pour une vente aux enchères efficace et dynamique pour plusieurs biens identiques
System and method for an efficient dynamic multi-unit auction
System und Verfahren für eine leistungsfähige und dynamische Auktion von mehreren Gegenständen
Système et méthode pour une enchère multiple dynamique et efficace

nplcit.text: No Search

abstract.p: A computer or computer system and method for implementing on a computer a dynamic multi-unit auction is described in which the price paid or received by bidders tends to be independent of their own bids, in which participants may be provided with information concerning their competitors' bids as the auction progresses, and in which the confidentiality of high values is maintained. The system receives bids from a plurality of bidders for a plurality of items in a dynamic bidding process and usually determines an allocation of the items among bidders. This provides the advantage of improving the economic efficiency of the auction design and usefully enables a seller or buyer to efficiently auction multiple types of goods or services, and to efficiently auction items with complex possibilities for substitution. <IMAGE>

System and method for an efficient dynamic multi-unit auction

nplcit.text: Little, "Auctioning is the wisest choice is you want best value", Government Computer News, v15, n28, p54(2), Nov. 4, 1996, Dialog file 148, Accession No. 09137259

abstract.p: A method and apparatus allow the computer based implementation of an auction of heterogeneous types of items wherein one or more types of the items may include plural items. At any point in the bidding process, the set of feasible assignments of the items, given the bidding state, is the set of all possible allocations of the available quantity of the types of items to the bidders, subject to satisfying all the constraints on the assignment of the items, the constraints on the bidding process and the constraints posed by the bidding state. There may be a time in the auction when, based on the bidding state, one or more items (of one or more types) can only be assigned to one particular bidder in any feasible assignment, i.e., the particular bidder is guaranteed to be assigned the item. Such item is assigned to such bidder at such time.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for an efficient dynamic multi-unit auction

abstract.p: The present invention implements an auction in which multiple types of goods may be auctioned in a dynamic process. In a preferred embodiment, the present invention is a system and method for a computer implemented dynamic multi-unit auction in which the price paid or received by bidders tends to be independent of their own bids, in which participants may be provided with information concerning their competitors' bids as the auction progresses, and in which the confidentiality of high values may be maintained. Participants' quantities bid at a given time may be restricted to be less than or equal to the quantities bid at an earlier time. These features provide the advantage of improving economic efficiency of the auction design over the prior art.

abstract.p: The present invention implements an auction in which multiple types of goods may be auctioned in a dynamic process. In a preferred embodiment, the present invention is a system and method for a computer implemented dynamic multi-unit auction in which the price paid or received by bidders tends to be independent of their own bids, in which participants may be provided with information concerning their competitors' bids as the auction progresses, and in which the confidentiality of high values may be maintained. Participants' quantities bid at a given time may be restricted to be less than or equal to the quantities bid at an earlier time. These features provide the advantage of improving economic efficiency of the auction design over the prior art.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for an efficient dynamic multi-unit auction

abstract.p: A method and apparatus allow the computer based implementation of an auction of heterogeneous types of items wherein one or more types of the items may include plural items. At any point in the bidding process, the set of feasible assignments of the items, given the bidding state is the set of all possible allocations of the available quantity of the types of items to the bidders, subject to satisfying all the constraints on the assignment of the goods, the constraints on the bidding process and the constraints posed by the bidding state. Depending on the particulars of the bids, there may be one or more items (of one or more types) which are only included in the bid of a single bidder. The bidding is constrained such that once an item is uniquely spoken for, that bidder is guaranteed to receive the item.
The item is said to be desired by only one bidder and such item is assigned to that bidder at the time. The auction continues until all items are assigned.

abstract.p: The present invention implements an auction in which multiple types of goods may be auctioned in a dynamic process. In a preferred embodiment, the present invention is a system and method for a computer implemented dynamic multi-unit auction in which the price paid or received by bidders tends to be independent of their own bids, in which participants may be provided with information concerning their competitors' bids as the auction progresses, and in which the confidentiality of high values may be maintained. Participants' quantities bid at a given time may be restricted to be less than or equal to the quantities bid at an earlier time. bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for an auction of multiple types of items

abstract.p: An improved system and method for a computer-implemented auction in which multiple types of items are auctioned together without imposing a particular division of supply or demand among the individual types of items. In some embodiments the auction of the present invention provides a means or method for establishing prices for the types of items, wherein the prices maintain a relationship. In other embodiments, the present invention provides a means or method for implying prices from price parameters in the bids received form bidders, based on a relation among the prices for the types of items. Market clearing may be defined by the condition that the aggregate quantity bid for all types of items is less than or equal to the available quantity of all types of items. The division among the types of items within is thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

In other embodiments, market clearing is defined by the condition that the quantity bid for one selected type of item is less than or equal to the available quantity of the selected type of item. The quantities of the other types of items are thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

abstract.p: An improved system and method for a computer-implemented auction in which multiple types of items are auctioned together without imposing a particular division of supply or demand among the individual types of items. In some embodiments the auction of the present invention provides a means or method for establishing prices for the types of items, wherein the prices maintain a relationship. In other embodiments, the present invention provides a means or method for implying prices from price parameters in the bids received form bidders, based on a relation among the prices for the types of items. Market clearing may be defined by the condition that the aggregate quantity bid for all types of items is less than or equal to the available quantity of all types of items. The division among the types of items within is thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

In other embodiments, market clearing is defined by the condition that the quantity bid for one selected type of item is less than or equal to the available quantity of the selected type of item. The quantities of the other types of items are thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

Market clearing may be defined by the condition that the aggregate quantity bid for all types of items is less than or equal to the available quantity of all types of items. The division among the types of items within is thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

In other embodiments, market clearing is defined by the condition that the quantity bid for one selected type of item is less than or equal to the available quantity of the selected type of item. The quantities of the other types of items are thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Bidder System For Efficient Dynamic Multi-Unit Auction

abstract.p: The present invention implements an auction in which multiple types of goods may be auctioned in a dynamic process. In a preferred embodiment, the present invention is a system and method for computer implemented dynamic multi-unit auction in which the price paid or received by bidders tends to be independent of their own bids, in which participants may be provided with information concerning their competitors' bids as the auction progresses, and in which the confidentiality of high values may be maintained. Participants' quantities bid at a given time may be restricted to be less than or equal to the quantities bid at an earlier time. These features provide the advantage of improving economic efficiency of the auction design over the prior art.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN AUCTION OF MULTIPLE TYPES OF ITEMS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE D'ENCHERES POUR DES ARTICLES DE TYPES MULTIPLES

abstract.p: An improved system and method for a computer-implemented auction in which multiple types of items are auctioned together without imposing a particular division of supply or demand among the individual types of items. In some embodiments the auction of the present invention provides a means or method for establishing prices for the types of items, wherein the prices maintain a relationship. In other embodiments, the present invention provides a means or method for implying prices from price parameters in the bids received form bidders, based on a relation among the prices for the types of items. Market clearing may be defined by the condition that the aggregate quantity bid for all types of items is less than or equal to the available quantity of all types of items. The division among the types of items within is thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

In other embodiments, market clearing is defined by the condition that the quantity bid for one selected type of item is less than or equal to the available quantity of the selected type of item. The quantities of the other types of items are thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé d'enchères assisté par ordinateur dans lesquelles des articles de types multiples sont mis aux enchères en même temps sans imposer de division spécifique d'offre ou de demande parmi les divers types individuels d'articles. Selon certains modes de réalisation de la présente invention, on propose un moyen ou un procédé de fixation des prix des différents types d'articles selon lequel les prix maintiennent une relation. Selon d'autres modes de réalisation, la présente invention fournit un moyen ou un procédé indiquant des prix à partir de paramètres de prix dans les offres reçues des enchérisseurs, en fonction d'une relation parmi les prix des différents types d'articles.

On peut définir l'équilibre du marché par la condition que l'offre de quantité accumulée pour tous les types d'articles est inférieure à ou égale à la quantité disponible de tous les types d'articles. La division des différents types d'articles à l'intérieur est alors déterminée de manière souple, à partir des offres aux prix associés. Selon d'autres modes de réalisation, on peut définir l'équilibre du marché par la condition que l'offre de quantité pour l'un des types d'articles sélectionné est inférieure ou égale à la quantité disponible du type d'article sélectionné. Les quantités des autres types d'articles sont alors déterminées de manière souple, à partir des offres aux prix associés.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AN AUCTION OF MULTIPLE TYPES OF ITEMS
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE D'ENCHERES POUR DES ARTICLES DE TYPES MULTIPLES

abstract.p: A system and method for a computer-implemented auction in which multiple types of items are auctioned together without imposing a particular division of supply or demand among the individual types of items. In some embodiments the auction (30) provides a means or method for establishing prices for the types of items, therein the prices maintain a relationship. In other embodiments, the present invention provides a means or method for implying prices from price parameters in the bids received from bidders (20a, 20b, 20c), based on a relation among the prices for the types of items. Market clearing may be defined by the condition that the aggregate quantity bid for all types of items is less than or equal to the available quantity of all types of items. The division among the types of items within is thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

In other embodiments, market clearing is defined by the condition that the quantity bid for one selected type of item is less than or equal to the available quantity of the selected type of item. The quantities of the other types of items are thus determined flexibly, based on the bids at the associated prices.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé d'enchères assisté par ordinateur dans lesquelles des articles de types multiples sont mis aux enchères en même temps sans imposer de division spécifique d'offre ou de demande parmi les divers types individuels d'articles. Selon certains modes de réalisation de la présente invention, on propose un moyen ou un procédé de fixation des prix des différents types d'articles selon lequel les prix maintiennent une relation. Selon d'autres modes de réalisation, la présente invention fournit un moyen ou un procédé indiquant des prix à partir de paramètres de prix dans les offres reçues des enchérisseurs, en fonction d'une relation parmi les prix des différents types d'articles.

On peut définir l'équilibre du marché par la condition que l'offre de quantité accumulée pour tous les types d'articles est inférieure à ou égale à la quantité disponible de tous les types d'articles. La division des différents types d'articles à l'intérieur est alors déterminée de manière souple, à partir des offres aux prix associés. Selon d'autres modes de réalisation, on peut définir l'équilibre du marché par la condition que l'offre de quantité pour l'un des types d'articles sélectionné est inférieure ou égale à la quantité disponible du type d'article sélectionné. Les quantités des autres types d'articles sont alors déterminées de manière souple, à partir des offres aux prix associés.
